title: In Memoriam: CLG Ear
body:
Today, through events transpired in battle and riot, our ~~meme~~lord CLG Ear fell to the enemy. From the words of his Eternal Mouthpiece, 2nd Chance, may we venerate him/her duly, we learnt of this happenstance.

But this is not the end! I proclaim here and thusly, in two week's time, he shall rise again. In the interim, we must give thanks to him for his sacrifice that we were spared the ire of the Moderators. 

Hallow'd be his name, I give thanks to ye, CLG Ear.
